timeline.author: aldebaran30701
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -75,10 +75,10 @@ To build Constellation from source code do the following:
 [Linux 64 bit](https://cdn.azul.com/zulu/bin/zulu11.39.15-ca-fx-jre11.0.7-linux_x64.tar.gz)
 or [MacOSX 64 bit](https://cdn.azul.com/zulu/bin/zulu11.39.15-ca-fx-jre11.0.7-macosx_x64.tar.gz)
 
-* Download [NetBeans 11.3](https://netbeans.apache.org/download/nb113/nb113.html)
-* Update `netbeans_jdkhome` in netbeans.conf to point to the Azul Zulu JDK you downloaded (e.g. `C:\Program Files\NetBeans-11.3\netbeans\etc`)
+* Download [NetBeans 12](https://netbeans.apache.org/download/nb120/nb120.html)
+* Update `netbeans_jdkhome` in netbeans.conf to point to the Azul Zulu JDK you downloaded (e.g. `C:\Program Files\NetBeans-12\netbeans\etc`)
 * NetBeans 11 have dropped support for the Java Help system but is still required by Constellation. Until we find a solution to #15 there are 2 jar files that have to be manually copied into the NetBeans installation folder.

timeline.author: aldebaran30701
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -75,10 +75,10 @@ To build Constellation from source code do the following:
 [Linux 64 bit](https://cdn.azul.com/zulu/bin/zulu11.39.15-ca-fx-jre11.0.7-linux_x64.tar.gz)
 or [MacOSX 64 bit](https://cdn.azul.com/zulu/bin/zulu11.39.15-ca-fx-jre11.0.7-macosx_x64.tar.gz)
 
-* Download [NetBeans 11.3](https://netbeans.apache.org/download/nb113/nb113.html)
-* Update `netbeans_jdkhome` in netbeans.conf to point to the Azul Zulu JDK you downloaded (e.g. `C:\Program Files\NetBeans-11.3\netbeans\etc`)
+* Download [NetBeans 12](https://netbeans.apache.org/download/nb120/nb120.html)
+* Update `netbeans_jdkhome` in netbeans.conf to point to the Azul Zulu JDK you downloaded (e.g. `C:\Program Files\NetBeans-12\netbeans\etc`)
 * NetBeans 11 have dropped support for the Java Help system but is still required by Constellation. Until we find a solution to #15 there are 2 jar files that have to be manually copied into the NetBeans installation folder.
-  * Download [org-netbeans-modules-javahelp.jar](https://github.com/constellation-app/third-party-dependencies/blob/master/NetBeans%20Help/org-netbeans-modules-javahelp.jar?raw=true) to `C:\Program Files\NetBeans 11.3\platform\modules` (using Windows as an example). Note that you will need to override this file when prompted.
+  * Download [org-netbeans-modules-javahelp.jar](https://github.com/constellation-app/third-party-dependencies/blob/master/NetBeans%20Help/org-netbeans-modules-javahelp.jar?raw=true) to `C:\Program Files\NetBeans 12\platform\modules` (using Windows as an example). Note that you will need to override this file when prompted.
   * Download [jhall-2.0_05.jar](https://github.com/constellation-app/third-party-dependencies/blob/master/NetBeans%20Help/jhall-2.0_05.jar?raw=true) to `C:\Program Files\NetBeans 11.3\netbeans\platform\modules\ext` (using Windows as an example)

timeline.bodyText: A bug preventing running the Merge Nodes and Geospatial Distance plugins from the Data Access View has been fixed.
timeline.author: aldebaran30701
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,15 +1,59 @@ == 3030-12-31 Getting Started

If you're new to CONSTELLATION, read the introduction.

+== 2020-07-08 Rendering Labels Bug Fixed +

A bug with labels being rendered with unreadable text after opening views has been fixed.

+ +== 2020-07-07 Manage Templates Layout Improvements +

The File > Manage Templates window's layout has been improved.

+ +== 2020-07-07 Import from Delimited Fixes +

A number of improvements have been made to the Import from Delimited:

+
    +
  • The filtering options from the preview table have been fixed so that doing Row !=1 works again.
    • +
  • A UX improvement has been made to allow you to import files of one type per session. After importing the first file, the Import File Parser is grayed out
    • +
+ +== 2020-06-18 Info Map Bug Fixed +

A bug preventing running the Clustering %gt; Info Map plugins has been fixed.

+ +== 2020-06-09 Select Top N Bug Fixed +

A bug preventing running the Select Top N from the Data Access View has been fixed.

+ +== 2020-05-21 Schema View +

The Node and Transaction type tabs in the Schema View are now searchable.

+ +== 2020-05-21 Hierarchical Clustering Improvements +

A bug preventing the running of the hierachical clustering sometimes has been fixed.

+ +== 2020-05-21 Merge Nodes by Geospatial Distance +

A bug preventing running the Merge Nodes > Geospatial Distance from the Data Access View has been fixed.

timeline.bodyText: running of the hierachical clustering plugin sometimes

timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,15 +1,59 @@ == 3030-12-31 Getting Started

If you're new to CONSTELLATION, read the introduction.

+== 2020-07-08 Rendering Labels Bug Fixed +

A bug with labels being rendered with unreadable text after opening views has been fixed.

+ +== 2020-07-07 Manage Templates Layout Improvements +

The File > Manage Templates window's layout has been improved.

+ +== 2020-07-07 Import from Delimited Fixes +

A number of improvements have been made to the Import from Delimited:

+
    +
  • The filtering options from the preview table have been fixed so that doing Row !=1 works again.
    • +
  • A UX improvement has been made to allow you to import files of one type per session. After importing the first file, the Import File Parser is grayed out

timeline.author: antares1470
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,15 +1,59 @@ == 3030-12-31 Getting Started

If you're new to CONSTELLATION, read the introduction.

+== 2020-07-08 Rendering Labels Bug Fixed +

A bug with labels being rendered with unreadable text after opening views has been fixed.

+ +== 2020-07-07 Manage Templates Layout Improvements +

The File > Manage Templates window's layout has been improved.

+ +== 2020-07-07 Import from Delimited Fixes +

A number of improvements have been made to the Import from Delimited:

+
    +
  • The filtering options from the preview table have been fixed so that doing Row !=1 works again.
    • +
  • A UX improvement has been made to allow you to import files of one type per session. After importing the first file, the Import File Parser is grayed out
    • +
+ +== 2020-06-18 Info Map Bug Fixed +

A bug preventing running the Clustering %gt; Info Map plugins has been fixed.

+ +== 2020-06-09 Select Top N Bug Fixed +

A bug preventing running the Select Top N from the Data Access View has been fixed.

+ +== 2020-05-21 Schema View +

The Node and Transaction type tabs in the Schema View are now searchable.

+ +== 2020-05-21 Hierarchical Clustering Improvements +

A bug preventing the running of the hierachical clustering sometimes has been fixed.

+ +== 2020-05-21 Merge Nodes by Geospatial Distance +

A bug preventing running the Merge Nodes > Geospatial Distance from the Data Access View has been fixed.

+ == 2020-05-18 Map Controls

We have updated the Map View mouse controls to be consistent with the graph view.

+== 2020-05-12 Table View +

A number of improvements have been added to the table view:

+
    +
  • The column selection has been improved to include sub categories for source, destination and transactions
    • +
  • Each column selection now includes a search filter
    • +
+ +== 2020-05-12 Support for MacOSX +

Constellation officially supports MacOSX!

+ == 2020-05-11 Two New Arrangement Options

Two new arrangement options are available via the Arrange menu and toolbar. These options are horizontal and vertical lines. Selecting these options allow selected (or all) elements to be arranged in either horizontal or vertical lines.

-== 2020-05-11 Delimiter importer +== 2020-05-11 Delimiter Importer

Added feedback dialogs for the Delimiter importer, showing information about a successful import and any failures.

+== 2020-05-11 Timeline View +

A bug resulting in the summary box shrinking when dragged passed the summary bounds has been fixed.

timeline.message: :art: Fix to some typos based on review feedback
